DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether simvastatin is effective in the improvement of IVF-ICSI outcome in Pcos patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Simvastatin on Biochemical Parameters and Outcome of IVF-ICSI in Pcos Patients
DOC.detailed_description: simvastatin reduces cardiovascular risks by improving hypercholesterolemia, reducing vascular smooth muscle proliferation, ameliorating inflammation, limiting theca-interstitial proliferation & decreasing steroidogenesis (production of progesterone & testosterone).Polycystic ovary syndrome (pcos) is associated with increased cardiovascular risks and is characterized by ovarian theca-interstitial hyperplasia& hyperandrogenism .This study will test the hypothesis that simvastatin improves biochemical parameters& IVF-ICSI outcome in Pcos patients.
DOC.criteria: Pcos patients Age <40 years FSH<10 IU/L Endometriosis grade 3 &4 History of tubal surgery Hydrosalpinx History of mellitis diabetes
